German Democratic Republic.Motto: Proletarier aller Länder, vereinigt Euch! (Workers of the world, unite!)
German Democratic Republic.Official Languages: German, Sorbian (in parts of Bezirk Dresden and Bezirk Cottbus)

Head of State.Name: Sabine Bergmann-Pohl
Head of State.Note: Last head of state before reunification

Head of Government.Name: Lothar de Maizière
Head of Government.Note: Last head of government before reunification

German Democratic Republic.Initial Flag: Identical to that of West Germany
German Democratic Republic.Territorial Administration: Soviet forces with autonomy of the native communists
German Democratic Republic.Political System: Communist state, socialist 'workers' and peasants' state'
German Democratic Republic.Foreign Relations: Satellite state of the Soviet Union, dominated by the SED

Geographical Borders.Borders with West Berlin: West Berlin (de facto part of the FRG)

German Democratic Republic.Berlin Wall: Built in 1961 to prevent emigration to the West
German Democratic Republic.Final Settlement: Replaced the Potsdam Agreement, leading to reunification
German Democratic Republic.Post-Reunification: Prosecution of GDR leaders for offenses committed during the GDR's times
